description: Present participle or participial adjective from cover (verb) +‎ -ing; or, from Middle English participle form of coveren, keveren (“to cover”).
From Middle English coverynge, -inge, keverynge, -inge [verbal noun of coveren, keveren (“to cover”)]; or, verbal noun from cover (verb) +‎ -ing.

entries.meaning: (countable) That which covers or conceals; a cover; something spread or laid over or wrapped about another.
(uncountable) Action of the verb to cover.
